field_schema.name: license_grant_scope
field_schema.description: Scope of license granted to the lessee or company, including rights and limitations

field_schema.name: lease_duration
field_schema.description: Minimum or expected duration of the lease (e.g., '3 years')

field_schema.name: termination_conditions
field_schema.description: Conditions under which the lease or agreement can be terminated by either party

field_schema.name: compliance_audit_terms
field_schema.description: Details around verification of compliance, including audit rights granted to Microsoft or the lessor

field_schema.name: prohibited_uses
field_schema.description: Any explicitly forbidden uses or restrictions outlined in the agreement (e.g., subleasing, standalone software use)
